Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20110902 Thunderbird/6.0.2

The menu command File > Offline > Offline settings depends on the currently selected account in the folder pane. This is not obvious. Either it should be renamed or moved to the account or moved to the account context menu, or the global offline settings (menu Tools > Options > Network & Disk space > Offline > Offline... is what I expected).
